name: Sinespace
description:
Sinespace is a virtual platform made for users and developers; build your own content and add it to Sinespace, or just jump in-world and start chatting to friends. It's a diverse and immersive world with lots of features, including race tracks, FPS games and quests. 

Key features for creators
  • The most powerful virtual world platform, ever. Design and build using everything you're used to - and assemble it together with the powerful Unity Editor.
  • Hundreds of built in components for creating multi-player games, social regions, vehicles, costumes and avatar customisation and so much more. 
  • Upload clothing, characters, creatures and critters for players to wear with our powerful Character System.
  • MMO-style quest designer tools for building narrative structures quickly.
  • Fast & powerful runtime & server scripting through Lua.
  • Keeps current with Unity - upgrades to the latest Unity features as soon as they're stable
  • Continuously developed - new features constantly being developed and added. 
  • Robust intellectual property policies.
  • Supported on Windows, Mac and Linux platforms, with more in beta.
Key features for users
  • Jump straight in-world and start chatting to friends!
  • Create your avatar using content from our marketplace; you can customise different outfits to create unique looking avatars.
  • Drive or fly through our wide selection of regions!
  • Have your own home region which you can decorate and edit to suit your style.
  • Start a shoot out with clowns, killer bunnies or sci-fi soliders in our FPS games!
  • Speed through our different race tracks to win 1st place!
  • Attend lots of different events such as music nights, dance nights or even join a Greedy Greedy Tournament!
System requirements Minimum requirements

The minimum requirements for sinespace are fairly low, however some regions and locations may require more modern hardware.

  • Operating System: Windows XP SP2+ or newer1, macOS 10.92 or newer, Ubuntu 12.04+ (other distributions have reported to work or SteamOS
  • Graphics Card: DirectX 9 capable GPU (Supports Shader Model 3.0 or higher)
  • Memory: 2GB or more
  • CPU: Supports SSE2 Instructions

1. After January 2018, some Windows XP computers will no longer be supported. Read about it in our forums.

2. Some features may not work in macOS clients older than OSX 10.11, we recommend updating to 10.12 or 10.13 if possible.

3. If you have Mac OS, you can download Sinespace from here. 

3. If you have Linux OS, you can download Sinespace from here.  

Recommended requirements

The optimal experience will be seen by people with the following computer specifications

  • Operating System: Windows 7 or newer, macOS 10.12 or newer, Ubuntu 12.04+ (other distributions have reported to work) or SteamOS
  • Graphics Card: nVidia GeForce 760 or ATI Radeon R9 280X
  • Memory: 4GB or more
  • CPU: Quad-core i5 Intel CPU
